title: BofA reports inflows into global stocks are on a record-setting pace — and ETFs may be a way to play the hot trade
description: There’s a corner of the market gaining traction among ETF investors, according to The ETF Store president Nate Geraci.

title: If you use these 13 phrases every day, you have higher emotional intelligence 'than most people': Psychology experts
description: Being able to emotionally connect with people is a rare and valuable skill. Here are the phrases that people with high emotional intelligence use every day, according to psychology experts.

title: Tipping in the United States has gotten out of control, experts say. Here's why
description: Tipping in the U.S. is on the rise to such a degree that experts call it "tipflation." With Americans being pressured to tip more, where's the tipping point?

title: How TikTok and its parent company spent over $13 million on struggling lobbying campaign
description: TikTok and ByteDance have been on a lobbying spending spree on Capitol Hill. Many of those efforts have fallen on deaf ears.
